name: Sumer
overview: Race to harvest, craft, and build in this Euro-style digital board game Sumer blends tabletop strategy with video game action. Board game night is coming to the Nintendo Switch™! Play as Sumerian nobles vying for the affection of the great goddess Inanna. Harvest barley, bid goats at auction, and perform ritual offerings to earn her favor and the right to rule by her side! In Sumer, you’ll build up a mighty ziggurat and explore a mysterious culture at the dawn of civilization. Beautiful art and atmospheric music bring an ancient Mesopotamian mural to life in this worker placement board game / action game hybrid for up to four players.
